reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan to be of great quality, super soft, and appreciate that it looks great both casually and dressed up. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it runs large. Customers have mixed opinions about the buttons, with one mentioning they're hard to poke.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Great sweater especially for the price. It definitely runs a little large so size down. Very soft and color is very pretty. Read more
items.author: Siobhan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy
items.body: This sweater has become my everyday grab and go. Perfect for Fl weather when you have to layer your clothes. You can dress it up or down and very soft. Read more
items.author: Charlotte

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great priced cardigan
items.body: Cute cardigan! Looks well made. Buttons are a bit hard to poke through the holes and this is longer than I’d prefer. Otherwise great for the price. Read more
items.author: Jordan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: Size is perfect. Comfy and also can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Matt Baranski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable
items.body: Soooo soft, I get compliments on this sweater all the time! I think it’s going to last quite a few seasons. Warm but not too bulky. Read more
items.author: Maddie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nope
items.body: Color was ugly, yarn fabric was itchy. Ran huge. Returned. Read more
items.author: Kelly Wilkins

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cardigan
items.body: I bought the green sweater, super soft but the white buttons looked odd. I think I would have liked it better if the buttons matched the fabric or would have been a natural wood color. I am planning on returning it. Read more
items.author: Kathryn Glorvick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cardigan
items.body: This is a great summer to fall transition piece to have in your closet. I styled it with 2 different denim washes to show how versatile this cardigan is with black to light. It can be styled multiple ways and perfect for everyday wear. The texture is very soft and a little thin (not see through). Read more
items.author: ashley

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Khaki, White, Blue, Cream, Apricot, Army Green, Dark Blue, Sage Green, Black, Navy Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
